short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shell Shockers is the world’s most popular egg-based multiplayer first person shooter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shell Shockers is the world’s most popular egg-based multiplayer first person shooter! Take control of a heavily armed egg and battle real players across multiplayer maps in private or public arenas. The hit web FPS game comes to your mobile device for eggciting free-range action!
